Hi,=C2=A0
Could I use bean "MatchesStatusCodeDecideRule", to select only su=
ccessfully pages (status 200 - 299) =C2=A0to the warc-fil, or what is the p=
urpose of this bean?
I am using Heritrix 3.2.0,=C2=A0I have following code =
in my crawler-beans.cxml file
<bean id=3D"scope" class=3D"org.archive.modul=
es.deciderules.DecideRuleSequence">...=C2=A0 =C2=A0<bean class=3D"org.archi=
ve.modules.deciderules.MatchesStatusCodeDecideRule">=C2=A0 =C2=A0 =C2=A0 <p=
roperty name=3D"decision" value=3D"ACCEPT" />=C2=A0 =C2=A0 =C2=A0 <property=
 name=3D"lowerBound" value=3D"200" />=C2=A0 =C2=A0 =C2=A0 <property name=3D=
"upperBound" value=3D"299" />=C2=A0 =C2=A0</bean>
</bean>
In heritrix_out.l=
og, =C2=A0the DecideRule of MatchesStatusCodeDecideRule only returns "NONE"=
 for every pages.
Best regardsUlf
